justification: The article states that "the Instance Test (IST)... is a tool used in HRI to assess the adoption of the intentional stance (i.e., attributing intentionality) towards a humanoid robot."

topic_or_construct: perception of the robot’s moral character
justification: It is noted that "the modified version of the Moral Character Questionnaire (MCQ)... we asked participants to rate the iCub on the MCQ scales to explore their perception of the robot as a possible moral agent."

The methods explain that the "Moral Foundation Questionnaire (MFQ)... investigates both the relevance of and the judgments about the five morally relevant dimensions: Harm, Fairness, Ingroup, Authority, and Purity."
